name: Blueberry French Toast In A Mug 🥗
description: For a sweet and delicious breakfast treat, this blueberry French toast mug is perfect for busy mornings. It's the ideal meal for satisfying your sweet tooth!
instructions: In a bowl, add egg, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla, and mix.
In a microwave-safe mug, place half of the cubed bread and desired amount of blueberries.
Place the rest of the bread, berries, and the egg mixture into the mug.
Microwave for 1½ minutes or until egg is fully cooked.
